# standardShareMenuItem()

**Instance Method**

Returns a menu item that your app uses for sharing the current document.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func standardShareMenuItem() -> NSMenuItem
```

## Return Value

An [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSMenuItem] for the Share menu.

## Discussion

Use this method to perform custom placement of the Share menu if your [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDocument] subclass returns `false` for [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDocumentController/allowsAutomaticShareMenu].

## Sharing

- **allowsAutomaticShareMenu**: A Boolean value that the system uses to insert a Share menu in the File menu.
